org.semanticweb.yars.nx

Class Literal

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.semanticweb.yars.nx.Literal
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Serializable, Comparable, Node

    public class Literal
extends Object
implements Node, Serializable
    An RDF literal of any data type Need to do newline escaping for (string) literals otherwise it's not valid RDF any more.
    Author:
    Andreas Harth, Tobias Kaefer
    See Also:
    Serialized Form

    • Method Detail

      • getData

        public String getData()
        Get escaped data. For compatibility's sake, this returns the text of the literal (w/o surrounding quotes).
        Returns:
        a) the text of the literal, b) null pointer if there is something wrong with the literal backing string.

      • getMarkupEscapedData

        public String getMarkupEscapedData()
        Get markup escaped data.
        Returns:
        String data

      • getUnescapedData

        public String getUnescapedData()
        Get unescaped data.
        Returns:
        String data

      • getLanguageTag

        public String getLanguageTag()
        Get language tag.
        Returns:
        a) the language tag if one is supplied b) null pointer, if there is no such language tag, c) null pointer, if there is something wrong with the literal-backing string

      • isConstant

        public boolean isConstant()
        Check whether it's a constant (literals are always).

      • getDatatype

        public Resource getDatatype()
        Get data type.
        Returns:
        a) the resource if one is supplied, b) null pointer, if there is no such resource, c) null pointer, if there is something wrong with the literal-backing string
